Verses: 1 ikkoniyaa Pattanaththile Avargal Iruvarum Yoodharudaiya Jebaaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Yoodharilum Girekkarilum Thiralaana Janangal Visuvaasikkaththakkadhaagap Pirasangiththaargal.
2 visuvaasiyaadha Yoodhargal Sagodhararukku Virodhamaagap Purajaadhiyaarudaiya Manadhai Ezhuppivittu, Pagaiyundaakkinaargal.

3 avargal Ange Aneganaal Sanjariththuk Karththarai Munnittuth Dhairiyamullavargalaaip Podhagampanninaargal; Avar Thamadhu Kirubaiyulla Vasanaththirkuch Saatchiyaaga Adaiyaalangalum Arpudhangalum Avargal Kaigalaal Seyyappadumpadi Anukkiragampanninaar.
4 pattanaththu Janangal Pirindhu, Silar Yoodharaiyum Silar Apposthalaraiyum Serndhukondaargal.
5 ivargalai Avamaanappaduththavum Kalleriyavum Vendumendru, Purajaadhiyaarum Yoodharum Avargal Adhigaarigalum Amalipannugaiyil,
6 ivargal Adhai Arindhu, Likkavoniyaa Naattilulla Pattanangalaagiya Leesthiraavukkum Therbaikkum Avaigalin Sutruppurangalukkum Odippoi;
7 ange Suviseshaththaip Pirasangampanninaargal.
8 leesthiraavile Oruvan Than Thaayin Vayitrilirundhu Pirandhadhumudhal Sappaaniyaayirundhu, Orubodhum Nadavaamal, Kaalgal Vazhangaadhavanaai Utkaarndhu,
9 pavul Pesugiradhaik Kettukkondirundhaan. Avanaip Pavul Utruppaarththu, Ratchippukketra Visuvaasam Avanukku Undendru Kandu:
10 nee Ezhundhu Kaaloondri Nimirndhu Nil Endru Uraththa Saththaththode Sonnaan. Udane Avan Kuthiththezhundhu Nadandhaan.
11 pavul Seydhadhai Janangal Kandu, Dhevargal Manusharoobameduththu Nammidaththil Irangivandhirukkiraargal Endru Likkavoniyaa Baashaiyile Saththamittuch Solli,
12 barnabaavai Yooppiththar Endrum, Pavul Pirasangaththai Nadaththinavanaanapadiyinaal Avanai Merkkoori Endrum Sonnaargal.
13 allaamalum Pattanaththukkumunne Irundha Yooppiththarudaiyakovil Poojaasaari Erudhugalaiyum Poomaalaigalaiyum Vaasalandaiyile Konduvandhu, Janangalodekooda Avargalukkup Baliyida Manadhaayirundhaan.
14 apposthalaraagiya Barnabaavum Pavulum Adhaik Kettapozhudhu, Thangal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu, Koottaththukkulle Odi, Uraththa Saththamaai

15 manushare, En Ippadich Seygireergal? Naangalum Ungalaippolap Paadulla Manushardhaane; Neengal Indha Veenaana Dhevargalaivittu, Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Samuththiraththaiyum Avaigalilulla Yaavatraiyum Undaakkina Jeevanulla Dhevanidaththirkuth Thirumbavendumendru Ungalukkup Pirasangikkirom.
16 sendra Kaalangalil Avar Sagala Janangalaiyum Thangal Thangal Vazhigalile Nadakka Vittirundhum,

17 avar Nanmai Seydhuvandhu, Vaanaththilirundhu Mazhaigalaiyum Sezhippulla Kaalangalaiyum Namakkuth Thandhu, Aagaaraththinaalum Sandhoshaththinaalum Nammudaiya Irudhayangalai Nirappi, Ivvidhamaai Avar Thammaikkuriththuch Saatchi Vilangappannaadhirundhadhillai Endraargal.
18 ippadi Avargal Solliyum Thangalukku Janangal Baliyidaadhapadikku Avargalai Amarththugiradhu Aridhaayirundhadhu.

19 pinbu Andhiyogiyaavilum Ikkoniyaavilumirundhu Sila Yoodhargalvandhu, Janangalukkup Podhanaiseydhu, Pavulaik Kallerindhu, Avan Mariththupponaanendru Enni, Avanaip Pattanaththukku Veliyile Izhuththukkonduponaargal.
20 seeshargal Avanaich Soozhndhunirkaiyil, Avan Ezhundhu, Pattanaththirkul Piravesiththaan. Marunaalil Barnabaavudanekoodath Therbaikkup Purappattupponaan.
21 andhap Pattanaththil Avargal Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththu, Anegaraich Seesharaakkinapinbu, Leesthiraavukkum Ikkoniyaavukkum Andhiyogiyaavukkum Thirumbi Vandhu,

22 seesharudaiya Manadhaith Thidappaduththi, Visuvaasaththile Nilaiththirukkumpadi Avargalukkup Buththisolli, Naam Anega Ubaththiravangalin Vazhiyaai Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesikkavendumendru Sonnaargal.
23 allaamalum Andhandhach Sabaigalil Avargalukku Mooppargalai Erpaduththivaiththu, Ubavaasiththu Jebampanni, Avargal Visuvaasiththup Patrikkonda Karththarukku Avargalai Oppuviththaargal.
24 pinbu Piseedhiyaanaattaik Kadandhu, Pambiliyaa Naattirku Vandhu,
25 perke Ooril Vasanaththaip Pirasangiththu, Aththaaliyaa Pattanaththirkup Ponaargal.
26 ange Kappal Eri, Thaangal Niraivetrina Kiriyaikkaaga Dhevanudaiya Kirubaikku Oppuvikkappattup Purappattu Andhiyogiyaavukku Vandhaargal.
27 avargal Ange Serndhapozhudhu Sabaiyaik Koodivarachseydhu, Dhevan Thangalaikkondu Seydhavaigalaiyum, Avar Purajaadhigalukku Visuvaasaththin Kadhavaiththirandhadhaiyum Ariviththu,
28 ange Seesharudanekooda Aneganaal Sanjariththirundhaargal.
